title: The House that Jack built and other fabulous fables
creator_contributor_role: Victorian Council for Children's Films and Television, distributor
A J Shalleck Productions, production company
subject_group: Literature/Children's literature - Film and video adaptations
description: Six delightful classic fables including "The House that Jack built" about the bag of malt, a rat a cat and much more. "Rumpelstiltskin", the strange little man who offers to help the miller's daughter for a terrible price. The Bremen Town musicians" who outsmart the evil robbers. "The Magic broom which helps Brenda Bunny save the house from thieves. "Henny Penny" who is convinced that the sky is falling. "Copycat dog", a city dog who must learn how to live on a farm.
